languages.text: "Поздно договариваться с этим бешеным псом. Он лишь рассмеется в ответ на твои мирные речи и казнит твоих послов. Каллигос слишком долго жил с ощущением вседозволенности, мнил себя царьком своих владений".

"Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."
languages.original_text: "Поздно договариваться с этим бешеным псом. Он лишь рассмеется в ответ на твои мирные речи и казнит твоих послов. Каллигос слишком долго жил с ощущением вседозволенности, мнил себя царьком своих владений".

traits.locale_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talks of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his own world."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “已经没人能和那条疯狗谈判了。他只会嘲笑你打算谈判的意图，之后处死你的特使。这么长时间以来，卡里戈斯一直在过着穷奢极欲的生活，以为他才是这个世界的主宰。”
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: “已经没人能和那条疯狗谈判了。他只会嘲笑你打算谈判的意图，之后处死你的特使。这么长时间以来，卡里戈斯一直在过着穷奢极欲的生活，以为他才是这个世界的主宰。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「あの狂犬と交渉するのはもはや選択肢にない。和解の話し合いを笑い飛ばし、使節を処刑されるだけだ。カリゴスはとても長い間不敬を謳歌し、自らをこの世界の王だと信じてきたからな」
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: 「あの狂犬と交渉するのはもはや選択肢にない。和解の話し合いを笑い飛ばし、使節を処刑されるだけだ。カリゴスはとても長い間不敬を謳歌し、自らをこの世界の王だと信じてきたからな」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Negociar con ese perro rabioso no es opción. Se limitará a reírse de sus intentos de reconciliación y ejecutar a sus emisarios. Calligos lleva demasiado tiempo regodeándose en la impunidad y creyéndose el rey del mundo».
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: «Negociar con ese perro rabioso no es opción. Se limitará a reírse de sus intentos de reconciliación y ejecutar a sus emisarios. Calligos lleva demasiado tiempo regodeándose en la impunidad y creyéndose el rey del mundo».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Verhandlungen mit diesem wahnsinnigen Hund kommen überhaupt gar nicht mehr in Frage. Er wird über Euer Gerede von Versöhnung nur lachen und Eure Gesandten hinrichten. Calligos darf schon zu lange ungestraft walten und sich zum König seiner Welt aufschwingen."
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: "Verhandlungen mit diesem wahnsinnigen Hund kommen überhaupt gar nicht mehr in Frage. Er wird über Euer Gerede von Versöhnung nur lachen und Eure Gesandten hinrichten. Calligos darf schon zu lange ungestraft walten und sich zum König seiner Welt aufschwingen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Négocier avec ce chien enragé n'est plus envisageable, il se moquera de vos pourparlers de réconciliation et se contentera d'exécuter vos envoyés. Cela fait trop longtemps que Calligos se prend pour le roi de son monde et croit pouvoir agir en toute impunité. »
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: « Négocier avec ce chien enragé n'est plus envisageable, il se moquera de vos pourparlers de réconciliation et se contentera d'exécuter vos envoyés. Cela fait trop longtemps que Calligos se prend pour le roi de son monde et croit pouvoir agir en toute impunité. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "O kudurmuş köpekle müzakere etmek, artık mümkün değil. Uzlaşma çabalarına gülüp geçer, ulakları da infaz eder. Calligos, dokunulmazlığından çok uzun süredir fayda sağlıyor ve bu dünyanın kralı olduğuna inanıyor."
languages.original_text: "Negotiating with that mad dog is off the table now. He will merely laugh at your talk of reconciliation and execute your envoys. For too long has Calligos revelled in impunity and believed himself the king of his world."

traits.locale_text: "O kudurmuş köpekle müzakere etmek artık mümkün değil. Uzlaşma çabalarına gülüp geçer ve ulaklarını da infaz eder. Calligos, dokunulmazlığından çok uzun süredir fayda sağlıyor ve kendisinin bu dünyanın kralı olduğuna inanıyor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
